name: Groobus Golfe (Pre-Alpha)
description:
GroobusGolfePreAlpha4 and GroobusGolfePreAlpha4_Scary are the same except GroobusGolfePreAlpha4_Scary uses a custom icon. For some reason the custom icon makes some antivirus software give a warning when running the .exe file. GroobusGolfePreAlpha4 does not use a custom icon and does not give me a warning.

I made some significant changes to picking up objects in pre-alpha 4. Very strange things happen when you drop objects while in the air now. I'm working on a solution for this, but for now have fun with it.
